name: Money Break Even
short_description: An indispensable tool, it secures profits and allows you to customize the management of one or more trades.

params.title: Money Break Even x.x.x.
params.content: The name, version, and link to find references for this tool

params.title: Mode
params.content: You can choose whether to monitor net profit in money or as a percentage to balance

params.title: Net Profit Activation ( $ | % )
params.content: Depending on the 'Mode' chosen will be the limit beyond which the break even will be activated

params.title: Net Profit Target ( $ | % )
params.content: After being activated if it reaches this value it closes everything according to the chosen logic

params.title: All Cross ?
params.content: You can choose to monitor the net profit of the current pair or all pairs

params.title: Auto Stop ?
params.content: If there are no more trades it stops the cbot, if this item is enabled and there are no trades at market the cbot will not start

params.title: Remove Pending Orders ?
params.content: In case of break even you can also remove pending orders

params.title: Color Target Logic
params.content: The color of the box if the logic is of target type, e.g., activation and target equal

params.title: Color Positive Logic
params.content: The color of the box if the logic is positive type, e.g. activation 10% and target 3%

params.title: Color Negative Logic
params.content: The color of the box if the logic is negative type, e.g. activation -3% and target 0%

params.title: Color Activated
params.content: The color if break even is activated

params.title: Vertical Position
params.content: The vertical position of the information box

params.title: Horizontal Position
params.content: The horizontal position of the information box
